title: Slow
author: calvinfo
aiHeadline: Why did the turtle cross the road? Because it's the slowest thing on Hacker News, clocking in at 534 points and 131 comments.

title: How was the Universal Pictures 1936 opening logo created?
author: azeemba
aiHeadline: From celluloid to pixels: How the 1936 Universal logo was created, because apparently, even old logos need 464 points of validation.

title: I tried Servo
author: robtherobber
aiHeadline: I tried Servo: A web browser engine that's so cutting-edge, it makes your browser feel like it's running on molasses, earning 326 points and 216 confused comments.

title: I know when you're vibe coding
author: thunderbong
aiHeadline: I know when you're vibe coding: Because the codebase looks like it was written by a caffeinated sloth, earning 326 points and 160 confused stares.

title: MacBook Pro Insomnia
author: speckx
aiHeadline: MacBook Pro Insomnia: When your laptop stays up all night, but you're still too tired to care, earning 315 points and 157 sympathetic nods.
